DOC.brief_summary: A study to validate, in a prospective manner, the ability of the predefined Genomic Health bladder cancer assay to detect recurrence in patients undergoing surveillance for non-muscle invasive bladder cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of a Urine-based Assay With Genomic Markers for Predicting Recurrence for Non-muscle Invasive Bladder Cancer
